## EntityMappingDefinition interface

Settings that define an entity mapping

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EntityMappingDefinition<Props extends Record<string, unknown>, Key extends EntityViews<Views>[Source]["key"], Source extends (string & keyof EntityViews<Views>), Scope = unknown, Views extends ReadModel = ReadModel, Dependencies extends (string & keyof Views)[] = []> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [auth?](./paramodel.entitymappingdefinition.auth.md) | [EntityAuthFunc](./paramodel.entityauthfunc.md)<!-- -->&lt;Scope, Props, Pick&lt;Views, Dependencies\[number\] \| Source&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An optional [EntityAuthFunc](./paramodel.entityauthfunc.md) that authorizes access to entities |
|  [dependencies?](./paramodel.entitymappingdefinition.dependencies.md) | Dependencies | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional array of view keys that the authorization function depends upon.<!-- -->The source entity view is an implicit dependency. |
|  [key](./paramodel.entitymappingdefinition.key.md) | Key | Entity key property (must be same as in source view) |
|  [source](./paramodel.entitymappingdefinition.source.md) | Source | Source entity view |
|  [type](./paramodel.entitymappingdefinition.type.md) | Type&lt;Props&gt; | Entity type |
